verses.roman:
eta bali' prabhu tāṅre kailā āliṅgana
vārāṇasī calibāre prabhura haila mana

synonyms: eta bali'—saying this; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāṅre—unto Rūpa Gosvāmī; kailā—did; āliṅgana—embracing; vārāṇasī—toward Benares; calibāre—to go; prabhura—of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; haila—was; mana—the mind.
translation: After saying this, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu embraced Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī. The Lord then decided to go to the city of Benares.
